message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very beneficial for you, and I'm willing to answer any questions you might have.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of a price around $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is cutting it a bit too close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $12,500?
